message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $20000 for this exceptional item.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to accept $20000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To further explore the possibility of a transaction, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $12000 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our original proposal and your counteroffer, aiming to find a mutually beneficial solution.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While $12000 is closer to my budget, I still cannot accept that price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. I respect your budgetary considerations and am willing to further adjust our pricing. In light of this, I propose a counteroffer of $11000 for the product. This price aims to strike a balance between our initial proposal and your latest counteroffer, while still reflecting the value of the product.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your thoughtful response, Bob. I am committed to finding a fair solution for both parties involved. Based on our previous discussions, I propose a counteroffer of $10750 for the product. This price is designed to be closer to your most recent offer while still maintaining the value of the product.
I appreciate your continued negotiation, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I understand your financial constraints and am willing to consider a final offer of $10625 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our previous discussions and aims to bring us closer to a mutually satisfactory agreement.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. Considering all factors, I would like to counter with an offer of $10500 for the product.
